01B1EBBA.Mod7_Description: {c_important}Upheaval{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_7}  * 100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun all enemies it damages for {c_number}[{SF_8}|1|]{/c} seconds.

5110F53B.Mod8_Description: If {c_important}Upheaval{/c} damages at least {c_number}[{SF_18}]{/c} enemies, you gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds, increased to {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds if it damages at least {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} enemies.

A06FFEBC.Mod9_Description: Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not {c_important}Upheaval{/c} causes your next cast of {c_important}Upheaval{/c} to deal {c_number}[{SF_12}  * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage, stacking up to {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} times.

F2DE8628.simple_desc: Fury Skill: Tear into the ground with your weapon and fling debris towards your enemies.
